entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add migrations with different assemblies, using Console App. #31948
  • Missing package README file #31947
  • Error when trying to parameterize Property from ExecuteUpdateAsync: "Unable to cast object of type 'System.Linq.Expressions.TypedParameterExpression' to type 'System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression'." #31946
  • Multiple Navigations to same key when building Migration #31945
  • [8.0-rc.1] 'dbcontext optimize' fails with 'Only primitive constant nodes are supported.', works in 7.0.11 #31942

Closed

  • EF Core for Cosmos is setting an Owned Entity Property with the same value as the Key #31903
  • SQLite affinity fallback is wrong: fallback to blob instead of numeric #31915
  • How can I map a class inheriting from UserControl? #31842
  • EFCore deletes an association on DbContext.SaveChanges when an existing link is removed and then added in the same transaction #31736
  • EFCore7 GetAsync Error Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'second') #31717
  • Hierarchyid in a parameter collection does not work in 8.0-rc1 with MSSQL #31912
    8.0.0
  • Is it possible to define relationships that could reference one of multiple tables without foreign keys? #31913
  • JSON: empty json collection is not correctly materialized, but rather returned as null #31731
    8.0.0
  • JSON Columns produce NULL value for empty collections #29348
    8.0.0
  • Query test infra: consider adding `IEnumerable<TResult> expectedResult` option to AssertQuery #31938
    MQ
  • Specifying enum typed discriminator on an entity type results in opaque ArgumentExceptions at query time #31547
    8.0.0
  • A property on a nested owned entity is not being saved in the CosmosDB document #31664
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [TEST ONLY] More AssertQuery refactoring #31956
  • Update branding to 7.0.13 #31954
  • Update branding to 6.0.24 #31953
  • [release/8.0] Fix to #30391 - JSON column issue with SetTableName() #31951
  • [release/8.0] Treat required owned entities on derived types as optional. #31950
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/7.0] Treat required owned entities on derived types as optional. #31949
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/6.0] Stop storing model references in the EntityMaterializerSource #31943
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Validate single discriminator values #31937
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/6.0] Cosmos: Persist non-shadow int keys on owned entity types #31936
    Servicing-approved

Merged

  • [TEST ONLY] Check if tests have any results rather than looking at entry count #31922
  • Calculate sentinel value inside RuntimeProperty #31923
  • [release/8.0] Make Contains work again over hierarchyid #31930
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Respect the difference between null/empty for owned collections mapped to JSON #31831
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Validate single discriminator values #31916
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/8.0] Cosmos: persist non-shadow int keys on owned entity types #31933
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Stop storing model references in the ValueGeneratorCache #31867
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.24
